title: Telegramâ€™s latest update improves message reactions, adds video stickers, and more
content:
Telegram is one of the best ways to send messages on Android smartphones and tablets, and the app’s latest update delivers some welcome improvements. Telegram is paving the way for many more stickers to arrive, as well as improving message reactions and more.

more…

The post Telegram’s latest update improves message reactions, adds video stickers, and more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Telegram has just launched a new update that improves message reactions and paves the way to expanding the app's excellent sticker catalog.
